bio: Marcel Wanders (born 1963) is a Dutch product and interior designer known for his imaginative and whimsical creations. His work often features unconventional materials and shapes, and he has collaborated with a wide range of brands and companies, including Swarovski, Louis Vuitton, and Mondrian Hotels. Wanders' designs are characterized by a playful and theatrical sensibility, and his work has earned him numerous awards and accolades.
